title: Indexes
context: §502-12 Indexes. The registrar shall keep indexes for public inspection in such form and manner as is prescribed by the board of land and natural resources. [L 1905, c 4, §3; RL 1925, §3129; RL 1935, §5115; RL 1945, §12715; RL 1955, §343-6; am L 1966, c 26, §2; HRS §502-12; am L 1980, c 39, §1; am L 1992, c 197, §6]
